ing: 1 (4.6 ounce) package cherry flavored sweetened soft drink mix
1 (46 fluid ounce) can unsweetened pineapple juice
1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
1 (6 ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed
des: "Makes a delicious drink and you can also float ice cream or sherbet on top."
ins: In a punch bowl prepare drink mix according to package instructions. Stir in pineapple juice and lemon-lime soda. Mix in the concentrated orange juice and lemonade. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
